name: liquid-ooze

effect.sun-moon: Whenever a Pokémon would heal after hitting this Pokémon with a leeching move like absorb, it instead loses as many HP as it would usually gain. dream eater is unaffected.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Whenever a Pokémon would heal after hitting this Pokémon with a leeching move like absorb, it instead loses as many HP as it would usually gain. dream eater is unaffected.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Whenever a Pokémon would heal after hitting this Pokémon with a leeching move like absorb, it instead loses as many HP as it would usually gain. dream eater is unaffected.

short_effect: Damages opponents using leeching moves for as much as they would heal.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Oozed liquid has strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Oozed liquid has strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The oozed liquid has a strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.
